Augmented Diplomat

Suborbital Bomber Evasion

Plasma Bomber Evasion
50% chance of evading interception.
Space Evasion
60% chance of evading interception by escaping velocity from Earth.
Stealth Drone Fighter

Advances in drone technology and autonomous computer systems lead to the development of advanced drone fighters, capable of handling air superiority roles. One of the major limitations on the development of fighter aircraft was the human element, as there was a limit to how many G stresses a human body could tolerate before failing. An automated fighter had no such restrictions, and thus could perform to the full capability of modern engineering.
The Stealth Drone Fighter is a futuristic air unit.
Air Unit designed to dominate the skies and intercept incoming enemy aircraft.
Suborbital Bomber

In an effort to try and push the range and striking power of bombers to their limit, newer generations of bombers were developed capable of travelling high in the atmosphere, just short of actually travelling into orbit. At these altitudes, they were extremely difficult to intercept, and could travel quickly through the thin atmosphere on semi-ballistic trajectories.
The Suborbital Bomber is a futuristic ranged unit.
A long-range Air Unit that rains death from above onto enemy Units and Cities.
Space Bomber

The Space Bomber is a unique space bombardment unit that can be mounted on the Nexus or Helicarrier and is a key component of the Nexus' strategic offensive capabilities. They embody the levitation facility Helicarrier and the Nexus' serious offensive power, and are effectively commanded by the highly concentrated Nexus Command Nodes. The Space Bomber is designed with advanced smart materials, allowing it to carry out attacks in extreme space environments. They can carry out large-scale attacks with powerful engines and a variety of weapons, including large amounts of bombs and lasers. The Space Bomber protects itself from enemy counterattack with a strong shield, and the Nexus serves to keep it safe from threats. Through this, it supports mankind's space colonization and plays an important role in removing risk factors in advance.
Unique Spaceship Bomber. Can be carried aboard Nexuses and Helicarriers.
Unique Spaceship Bomber. Can be carried aboard Nexuses and Carriers.
Space Fighter

The Space Fighter is a unique space fighter unit that can be mounted on a Nexus or Helicarrier. They form the levitating facility Helicarrier and the Nexus key line of defense, and are effectively piloted and controlled by the Nexus highly-focused command node. Space fighters have powerful space combat capabilities, with the ability to attack from the air into and out of the atmosphere. Space fighters are designed with advanced smart materials, and are purpose-built units for operations in space. They are equipped with powerful engines capable of operating in extreme space environments, as well as various weapons such as missiles and lasers. In addition, they protect themselves from enemy attacks with a strong shield and protect the Nexus. Through this, it acts as an important factor in supporting human space colonization.
Unique Spaceship Fighter. Can be carried aboard Nexuses and Helicarriers. It has increased range and combat ability compared to other aircrafts.
Unique Spaceship Fighter good for intercepting and air sweeping. Can be carried aboard Nexuses and Carriers.
Automaton

Since the earliest robots were developed, the concept of a robotic soldier has existed. While some success was had with remote-controlled machines as early as World War Two, it wasn't until the deployment of drone combat vehicles at the end of the 20th century that the concept of an autonomous combat machine began to seem feasible. It would still take more extensive development of cognitive technology for autonomous weapon systems, often termed "automatons", to become practical on the battlefield.
The Automaton is a futuristic infantry unit.
Cheap and powerful futuristic Unit that is stronger in groups. Constructed more quickly in cities with Autoplants and Drone Hives.
Chimera

With the development of gengineering permitting the creation of entirely new organisms to fill various needs, many new chimeras were developed to be utilized in combat environments. With predatorial instincts and engineered abilities allowing them to move quickly, traverse rough terrain, and even adaptive camouflage, these chimeras proved to be terrifying to human military forces.
The Chimera is a futuristic Mounted and Mobile Unit.
A future era unit that is very versatile and mobile, strong against fortified units. Heals every turn.
Bio-Titan

Representing the end of biotechnology, Bio-Titans are gigantic organisms designed entirely for combat. As the genetic chimeras and the various battle forms became increasingly complex, some bioengineers decided to see how much power the battle forms could have. Bio-Titans used the knowledge gained from cloning the genes of ancient dinosaurs to clone some of Earth's most massive creatures and accelerate their genes. It doesn't stop there, but surprisingly it has also resulted in research into integrating small nuclear reactors, powerful energy sources, into organisms. This influx of ex vivo energy sources boosted the Bio-Titans' metabolism, dramatically affecting their growth, recovery abilities, and combat performance. These in-body atoms replaced conventional radioisotope generators, allowing organisms to generate and store powerful energy. This technology allowed the Bio-Titans to have very powerful attacks that surpassed those of the Carnage Robots, while also giving them great regenerative abilities in their organic combat form. The Bio-Titans fear no battle now, and their strength and vitality are a testament to the limits of human engineering and biotechnology. Through this, we see how humans can create infinite possibilities by combining nature and engineering.
The Bio-Titan is a futuristic melee unit. Slower than Giant Death Robots but stronger. Has also the Titanic promotion that allows to double attack.
One of the most powerful units towards the end of the game. Slower than carnage robots, but stronger. Visibility increases due to massiveness.
Genoswarm

The original biotech chimeras were mostly short-lived, and some lacked basic survival instincts and even the organs necessary for long-term survival. Most of these earlier forms of combat were used with more success, but with the advent of the Bio-Titans, this style of combat was later revisited. Apart from the development of the Bio-Titans, these early Chimeras were primarily intended to disrupt and disrupt enemy attacks. They were support units of sorts, charged swiftly and mercilessly into enemy formations, disrupting their strategy. Their job was to distract the enemy, delay their attacks, and cause as much confusion and damage as possible. Even if they do not have abundant life force, they have high energy stores that allow them to continue to be active until they die. Despite lacking a camouflage system, their primary mission was to attack and harass the enemy, requiring aggressive action rather than survival. For this reason, they were tasked with attacking relentlessly, breaking enemy defenses, and constantly putting pressure on the enemy. Their only goal was to charge endlessly at their enemies, which made them powerful and ruthless attackers.
The Genoswarm is a futuristic infantry unit.
Mobile and weak unit that causes a strong Neurotic Poison effect for 3 turns on Attack. Good against Titan Units if it has some backup.
Organic Infantry

Advances in genetic engineering and forced tissue growth lead to increasing developments in the fields of organic composites and implants. Many of these advances were turned towards military ends, used to develop regenerative body armor and combat implants that enhanced the performance of soldiers.
The Organic Infantry is a futuristic infantry unit.
Elite Unit of the future and first to requires implant to build.
Clone Trooper

These clones are 'breeded' and ready for war, they have the Phase I armor which consist of twenty form-fitting plates of lightweight plastoid-alloy composite. Those plates were sealed to a black temperature control bodysuit via magnatomic gription panels. The bodysuit was also pressurized, offering temporary protection against the vacuum of space, and the body glove protected the clone from the extreme cold and heat. The armor's design was reminiscent of the Mandalorian armor, including the helmet with a distinctive T-shaped visor. Despite its advantages, the Phase I armor proved uncomfortable for the troopers to fit in, which was due to the Kaminoans' unfamiliarity with human ergonomics.
The Clone Trooper is a basic futuristic Infantry Unit.
Unit that can be produced with ADN Fungus in the future era. Regeneration is enhanced. [ICON_RES_ADN_FUNGUS] 1 ADN fungus is required.
Mutant

As soon as the earliest forms of genetic manipulation techniques were perfected, it was inevitable that there would be some less ethical organizations that would seek to experiment on human subject, often with an eye towards creating powerful new super soldiers or bioweapons. More often than not, however, these crude experiments resulted in hideous monstrosities, although many were noted to have exceptional durability and regenerative capbilities that made them useful to field in combat. The most insidious cases also carried dangerous viruses that were released upon their death, often resulting in insanity amongst their attackers.
Attack Infantry unit that heals every turn and after killing an enemy unit.
Mobile Unit that heals itself. Become stronger against injured units.
BioTrooper

Advances in biomodification eventually permitted extensive modifications to the human body, to the point that they barely seemed human anymore. Nowhere was this most apparent than in the development of biomodified soldiers, often called "biotroopers". These soldiers were as fast and durable as infantry wearing powered armor, but with fewer logistical demands, and the capability to regenerate combat damage with relative ease. Biotroopers did tend to cause a certain amount of unease around less heavily modified individuals, however, and typically ended up forming their own insular communities amongst ecocities.
The BioTrooper is a futuristic infantry unit.
Elite infantry unit of the future that can travel through rough terrain and is stronger in enemy territory.
Nano-Battlesuit

Nano-Battle suits provided unparalleled protection and strength to human soldiers, yet their operation still required human control. The advancement of artificial intelligence gave birth to robotic units, and while they demonstrated combat capabilities on par with human soldiers, they ultimately needed direct human intervention to confront new threats. With the emergence of colossal creature units like Tyrannosaurs and Chimeras on the battlefield, there was a pressing need for human agility and decisiveness for effective counteraction. As a result, bipedal mechanical armor, which could be directly controlled by humans and manipulate hands with dexterity, was developed. These suits proved highly efficient in combating massive creatures under human control and, after the conflicts, possessed the flexibility to be repurposed for various civilian tasks. This process clearly highlighted the need for a proper balance between the automated efficiency of robotic units and the versatility of machines requiring human operation.
The Nano-Battlesuit is a futuristic infantry unit. Although fast, they cannot move after combat like Tanks; their primary responsibility is, as always, to take and hold the ground.
Futuristic infantry unit with ranged attacks and effective defense against mounted units.
Super Soldiers

The Supersoldier is a concept soldier, often capable of operating beyond normal human limits or abilities either through genetic modification, implants or cybernetic augmentation. Supersoldiers are common in military science fiction literature, films, and video games. Fictional supersoldiers are usually heavily augmented, either through surgical means, eugenics, genetic engineering, cybernetic implants, drugs, brainwashing, traumatic events, an extreme training regimen or other scientific and pseudoscientific means. In entertainment, the creators of such programs are viewed often as mad scientists or stern military personnel depending on the emphasis, as their programs would typically go past ethical boundaries in the pursuit of science or military might.

Super Soldiers are an important guerrilla infiltration force capable of entering enemy territory. They are spotted by scout drone units, destroyers, and submarines, and can be detected if they attack or come right next to another unit. You can secretly approach other units to inflict great damage, infiltrate enemy territory and destroy facilities, destroy great people, or interfere with the movement of ship parts.

Super Soldiers are an important guerrilla infiltration force capable of entering enemy territory. [COLOR_PLAYER_PURPLE] Chameleon [ENDCOLOR] There is an upgrade, so you can't be detected by enemies. They are detected if they attack, are in line of sight of a detectable unit, or are directly next to another unit. You can disrupt enemy territory by invading it.
Orbital Drop Shock Trooper
The Orbital Drop Shock Troopers or Space Marines are a special operations military that specialize in orbital-dropped shock infantry and special warfare tactics.

The Orbital Drop Shock Trooper squad is designed for quick reaction and fast response, capable of deploying anywhere in the world at a moment's notice as long as there is a sight radius. Whether it be for storming enemy lines or positions, striking strategic tile improvements, or deploying as quick reaction reinforcements or to simply holding the line against enemies, there is little the ODST cannot do.
Fast and strong Infantry of the future that cannot move after combat like Tanks. It is capable of deploying anywhere on the entire map, as long as it begins its turn within friendly territory.
Robot Infantry

While powered armor gave human soldiers unparalleled protection and strength, it still relies on a human to operate the suit. Advances in artificial intelligence eventually lead to the ultimate soldier - a robotic unit that could fight equally as well as a human. Although there were a number of concerns about the prospect of fielding large numbers of robotic units with minimal human control, those societies that did so found them to be highly efficient and effective on the battlefield, with fewer issues involved in adapting them back to civilian duties during peacetime.
The Robot Infantry is the ultimatum Anti-Armor infantry unit with stronger than the regular Automaton. More powerful in groups.
Powerful futuristic Unit that is stronger in groups. Constructed more quickly in cities with Autoplants and Drone Hives.
Colossus
Colossus is an anti-armored infantry unit that is more powerful than the Robot Infantry. This final Ranged Unit has Indirect Fire (can perform attacks over obstacles) and is stronger in group.

One of the principles of strategic defense is that fewer troops are required to defend than to attack. Defenders can deploy their resources more efficiently with a deep understanding of the positions they are guarding. Indeed, even the most basic military AI systems can build effective defenses with limited time and intelligence. However, when advanced AI systems intervene, these defenses become far more efficient and effective. Developed in this way is the Cognitive Neuroelectronic Defense Registry (CNDR), a system with robust connectivity and high modularity that provides the best defense capabilities to observe, report, adapt and respond to incoming threats. This system also has the ability to prepare for the case of communication control of the robot corps. In particular, the CNDR system serves as a key component of the Colossus, a defense unit. The Colossus is armed with a powerful plasma cannon, which itself has high defense. With the help of the CNDR system, Colossus will be able to respond faster and more accurately to incoming threats, while at the same time gaining control over the entire operation of its robot corps. In this way, CNDR and Colossus are seamlessly linked to each other, opening up a new dimension of military strategy.
Colossus is a powerful ranged robotic unit equipped with a plasma cannon mounted on a launcher. A powerful and solid defensive ranged archer unit.
Railgun Armor

While conventional tank munitions have continued to improve over the decades, electromotive weapons hold the potential to be even more devastating. Conventional cannons had increasingly adopted sabot rounds to penetrate enemy armor, as these rounds could focus more energy on a smaller area, but railguns could fire rounds with a similarly small surface area even faster. The earliest railguns were mounted upon naval vessels, but advances in power plants and energy systems eventually lead to newer generations of railguns that could be mounted on armored vehicles.
The Railgun Armor is a futuristic armored tank and is also the first unit to benefit from [ICON_RES_NANOMAT] Nanomaterials.
Fast and powerful futuristic Tank that is the first unit to benefit from [ICON_RES_NANOMAT] Nanomaterials.
Mobile Launch Rocket Systems
This Rocket Artillery is a highly mobile automatic system that fires 12 surface-to-surface missiles in less than a minute.
Launch Rocket Systems are pre-future Siege units, with better mobility and sight compared to it's predecessor.
Powerful siege unit with more mobility and sight than its predecessor.
Mech Artillery

While wheeled and tracked vehicles are still the most practical, the concept of a legged combat vehicle has long captured the imagination of engineers and scientists. It was inevitable that experimentation towards making viable legged vehicles would be conducted, with the earliest practical prototypes being multilegged frames. These walkers could traverse some rough terrain that even tracked vehicles couldn't, although most were outfitted with wheeled secondary movement systems to allow them to drive along roads and smooth terrain at higher speeds than they could walk. Their articulated frames had difficulty withstanding the recoil of tank cannons, however, and thus they were typically outfitted with missile systems to avoid any problems. These mechs became useful as artillery platforms, able to fire from locations unreachable by conventional vehicles, confounding efforts to deter them.
The Mech Artillery is a futuristic siege unit.
Powerful siege unit of the future.
Zeke

Zeke is a powerful unit of the future era that can walk on two legs unlike existing tanks. Through research and development of bipedalism and AI, it has become possible to handle the center of gravity and joints freely. In fact, considering the price, performance, and mobility due to the limitations of new materials, there was an advantage in not losing mobility in places such as rivers and wetlands. The high field of view provided a good view of the battlefield, but the high position had the disadvantage of increasing the chance of firing against tanks with an enemy's low center of gravity. However, with the advent of fast guerrilla units of dinosaurs such as Tyrannosaurus and Chimera, a biped walking robot was needed to avoid the enemy's fast movement and river movement restrictions, so it was developed.

Zeke is a powerful bipedal mecha tower, but requires 2 Nanomaterials instead. It is not blocked by rivers nor marshes, like than it's predecessor, the wheeled tanks. You can move immediately after attacking.
Powerful Tank unit with double armor, but also double material cost. It's mobility is similar to the previous tanks, but is not obstructed by rivers nor marshes. It's field of view increases by 1.
Gundam

Gundam is a powerful defense unit from the future. The center of gravity and joints can be handled freely. The high field of view provided a good view of the battlefield, but the high position had the disadvantage of increasing the chance of firing against tanks with an enemy's low center of gravity. In fact, considering price, performance, and mobility due to limitations of new materials, there was an advantage in being able to move through boosters without losing mobility in places such as rivers and wetlands. It is similar to the two-legged robot Zeke and Massacre, but it is a system that is controlled by a human pilot. Humans have developed Gundams that can maximize the capabilities of pure humans and demonstrate the advantages of science and technology without relying on genetic evolution and digital assimilation.
Gundam is a final Gunpowder and powerful defensive Robot type weapon. It is not blocked by rivers and can para-drop almost anywhere on the World.
Gundam is a final Gunpowder and powerful defensive Robot type weapon. It is not blocked by rivers and can para-drop almost anywhere on the World. It's Field of View is increased.
Vertol Gunship

As the technology behind vertical take-off and landing aircraft matured, an increasing variety of designs began to appear, displacing the standard helicopter gunship. An increasing number of VTOL aircraft utilized jet turbines, but were designed to allow the engines to pivot or otherwise direct their thrust. These aircraft, because of their VTOL capabilities, were often referred to as "vertols" as a shorthand.
The Vertol is a futuristic aerial unit designed to hunt enemy Armor units, it is now able to cross the ocean, but not attack on it.
Unit specialized in fighting Modern and Railgun Armor. It is capable of hovering over Mountains and the Ocean.
Hovertank

The concept of a tank that could cross any terrain by hovering over it has long been a staple of science fiction. Eventually, however, advances in materials engineering, power plants, and control systems made this a reality. With improved power plants, vertols could be configured to carry enough armor to rival a ground-based tank, and sophisticated expert systems and cybernetic controls permitted their crews to handle the aerodynamically unstable craft. These new units were as fast as older vertols, but as heavily armed and armored as tanks. Often they were configured with missiles with EMP warheads, allowing them to devastate advanced armor units, although they proved to be less successful against infantry utilizing biomodifications.
The Hovertank is a futuristic aerial unit designed to hunt enemy Armor units.
Unit specialized in fighting Railgun Armor and Giant Death Robots. It is capable of hovering over Mountains and the Ocean.
Cybersub

Life on board a submarine has always been stressful for its crews, demanding long periods of time spent in extremely confined quarters. As computer systems became more sophisticated, it was a natural conclusion to try and automate as many of the processes on board submarines, to reduce the number of crew required. Advanced in nanomaterials also permitted a new generation of submarine hulls and torpedo weapons that could move faster and hit targets further away. The extensive automation and computer-assisted controls lead to this new generation of submarines being termed "cybersubs".
The Cybersub is a futuristic submarine.

Invisible to all Units except Destroyers, Missile Cruisers, Arsenal Ships, and other Submarines, or until it attacks or is adjacent to another unit. Can carry two Missiles, and is specialized in attacking Naval Units.
Zumwalt Destroyer

Ever since their development, destroyers have been an indispensable part of modern navies. With their high speed and sensor suites, they could serve as a first line of defense, spotting hostile ships and submarines. Advanced in materials engineering and sensor technology have lead to continuous upgrades in their design, however. Particularly with the advent of stealth technology and computer systems to enhance the effectiveness of sensor systems, these new, advanced destroyers have become an even more essential part of the navy. The 21st Century Destroyer is the global standard for surface warships. They tend to display features such as large, slab-sided, free of complex corners and crevices to keep the radar cross section small, and vertical launch systems for carrying large numbers of missiles and helicopter flight decks and hangars ready to launch. The combination of hardware and software allows for a wider detection range, improved sensitivity, and more accurate identification. Only one of these ships can simultaneously defend an entire fleet from ballistic missiles, cruise missiles, enemy aircraft and surface ships.

The Zumwalt Destroyer is a futuristic version of the Destroyer. A very powerful and expensive naval melee unit, capable of tracking submarines from a distance and effectively dealing with all air threats.
Capable of carrying four missiles, this extremely powerful naval melee unit can see submarines from a distance. The value of Aegis destroyers is to intercept air units.
Arsenal Ship

An arsenal ship is a concept for a floating missile platform intended to have as many as five hundred vertical launch bays for mid-sized missiles, most likely cruise missiles. In some naval doctrines, arsenal ships would be commanded remotely by another ship, although as computer systems became more sophisticated some were converted to become largely autonomous.
The Arsenal Ship is a futuristic successor to the Missile Cruiser. It can carry four Missile units, as well as having its own powerful ranged attack.
The Arsenal Ship is a futuristic successor to the Missile Cruiser. It can carry four Missile units, as well as having its own powerful ranged attack.
Advanced Aegis Aircraft Carrier
Carries 10 Aircraft (up to 13 with promotions), has better vision, armor and anti-air weapons.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]May only have [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]2[ENDCOLOR] Carriers active at one time.

Advanced Aegis Aircraft Carrier is a specialized vessel which carries fighter airplanes, bombers (but not stealth bombers), and atomic bombs. While the Supercarrier cannot directly attack, the aircraft it carries makes it the most powerful offensive weapon afloat. Defensively, while the Supercarrier can defend itself from both close range surface and long range air attacks, the Supercarrier is still weak and should be escorted by Missile Destroyers and Nuclear Submarines.
The Advanced Aegis Aircraft Carrier is the Nanotech evolution of the Nuclear Aircraft Carrier.
Hybrid Drone

Advances in biocomputers and organic composites have led to experiments with integrating biological components into existing unmanned devices. The unit's organic component, called the Hybrid Drone, made it easier to repair and maintain the unit in the field due to regenerative technology developed for specific infantry units. One unusual side effect was that the drones seemed to develop an almost animalistic urge, becoming prey to enemy aircraft, particularly slow-moving submarines and armored units.
Hybrid drones are future-era hovering recon units.
A recon unit from the future era. Specialized in fighting submarines and armored units. Recovers HP each turn and can move. It is also possible to float on Ocean tiles.
Antimatter Fusion Nuclear Bomb

Antimatter fusion bombs are weapons that go beyond current scientific and technological principles. This weapon harnesses the tremendous energy generated by the interaction of antimatter and matter, and combines it with nuclear fusion to further enhance its destructive power. The weapon's basic principle is to use antimatter to create an environment of extremely high temperature and pressure, which causes hydrogen isotopes to fuse. The energy released in the fusion process further promotes the interaction of antimatter with matter, which in turn releases more energy. The energy thus created has far-reaching and destructive effects on the earth's surface.
When it detonates, a Pure Fusion Nuclear Bomb will destroy all cities and units within its blast radius of 2 tiles. It is automatically destroyed when it attacks.

Unleash the ultimate destruction upon your foes. Does extreme damage to Cities and kill any Unit caught in the blast radius.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Requires [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Manhattan Project[ENDCOLOR] and 3 [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium.
Biodrone

Revolutionary advances in biotechnology and organic composites have led to the experimental development of biodrone, or organism-based drones. Biodrones are the result of a combination of biogenetic technology and high-level technological innovation, and have unique characteristics. In particular, they have developed survival instincts, allowing them to sensitively detect and destroy submarines and camouflaged infantry. The bio-drones' bio-components give them self-repair and maintenance capabilities. This is due to the regenerative technology developed for certain infantry units, which enhances their continuity on the battlefield and their ability to operate over a long period of time. Also, the biodrone had an unexpected result, as the drones seemed to develop animal-like instincts. They are particularly sensitive against submarines and camouflaged infantry, and certainly against armored units. These detailed characteristics make BioDrones highly effective reconnaissance units, and their existence makes them crucial in gathering vital intelligence and destroying enemies on the battlefield.
Bio-Drone is the ultimate recon unit of the future era, and can quickly suppress terrorism.

A very powerful hovering recon unit. Recovers HP every turn and can move quickly. Specialized in fighting submarines and armored units. It is also possible to float on Ocean tiles. You can watch the sky over 6 tiles regardless of obstacles.
Railgun missile

Improvements in nanomaterials engineering and propulsion technologies lead to a leap forwards in the design of guided missiles. Utilizing ramjet engines with extra-lightweight frames, this new generation of missiles was capable of reaching hypersonic speeds, allowing them to strike from further away before a response could be made.
Railgun missiles are a futuristic version of Guided Missile.
A one-shot Unit that may be used once to damage enemy Units or Cities.
Plama Bomb Missile

The fusion of plasma and superconductors has made it possible to dramatically increase the destructive power of railgun missiles. It was possible to increase the destructive power by using the plasma phenomenon in it at the supersonic speed of the existing ultra-light rail gun, and it could attack from a farther distance with more advanced nanotechnology.
Plasma Missile is a futuristic version of the Railgun Missile.
A one-shot Unit that may be used once to damage enemy Units or Cities.
Crawler SAM

The Crawler SAM is an advanced anti-air unit that pushes the limits of traditional resupply systems with innovative logistics methods. The Crawler SAM is equipped with a small nuclear reactor to secure an energy source to improve mobility, and also to continuously produce and equip powerful plasma missiles. This unit utilizes self-made missiles to effectively attack enemies in the air, and is also used for self-defence. These capabilities make crawler SAMs essential for countering air threats while providing logistical support to units on the ground. This unit introduces a new paradigm of combat by providing tactical flexibility while solving complex logistical challenges. This unit will ultimately be a major factor in tactical battlefield dominance.
The Crawler SAM is an anti-air unit capable of carrying 4 missile units. Each player can have up to 4.
Anti-aircraft unit of the future era that can mount 4 missiles and can attack 3 consecutive times in one turn. You can hold up to 4 units.
Angel

While walking-type self-propelled guns are predominantly used on the battlefield, Angel was born to compensate for the shortcomings of walking-type self-propelled guns. This ultra-powerful combat unit was created based on advanced materials engineering and advances in micro-reactor generators, solving some of the logistical and defense-related problems faced by walking self-propelled guns. The Angel shows more solid defense compared to the existing walking-type self-propelled guns. This has been made possible by a defense shield system based on the use of new materials and the development of nuclear fusion power generation technology. This shield system allows it to withstand heavy weapon damage, while at the same time providing strong resistance to physical attacks from melee units. Also, this unit has excellent siege abilities. The compact fusion power plant provides extreme power, and can be equipped with a plasma cannon to unleash heavy damage. As a result, the Angel is active as a siege unit with strong breakthrough power on the battlefield. Angels can determine their strength on the battlefield by strengthening their defense and maximizing their attack power. This unit will play an important role on the battlefield of the future, supporting the rear and spearheading the attack.
The Angel is a siege unit that can mount one missile unit. Each player can have up to 4.
The Angel is a siege unit that can mount one missile unit. Each player can have up to 4.
Nanohive

The development of nanomachines, particularly nanoassemblers and nanodisassemblers, inevitably resulted in a search to weaponize these devices and utilize them for military purposes. While some success was had with short-lived nanoswarms delivered as missile payloads, most nanoswarms had difficulty surviving extended periods in battlefield conditions. Eventually, the idea of using autonomous carriers, termed "nanohives", to deliver swarms of nanomachines to the battlefield was conceived. Using sophisticated low-altitude hovering technology, these nanohives were able to traverse nearly any terrain to bring nanoswarms to the front. With proper programming, nanoswarms could be assigned to both heal friendly units, as well as attack enemy units, slowly but inexorably dissolving targets away as they were disassembled on a molecular level.
The Nanohive is a futuristic unit that heals friendly units while damaging enemy units within two tiles of it each turn.
The Nanohive is a futuristic unit that heals friendly units while damaging enemy units within two tiles of it each turn.
Nexus

The ultimate turning point in the War of the Future Era is represented by the arrival of the Nexus. The Nexus is an advanced spacecraft designed for colonization, designed to support human life in the harsh conditions of space. A combination of advanced smart materials and miniaturized fusion power plants, this airborne complex enables virtually self-sustaining life and effective defense in space. At the heart of the nexus are highly concentrated command nodes with people's living spaces. This node provides continuous combat situation analysis and provides necessary updates in real time based on the situation around the nexus. In addition, inside the Nexus, a nanohive is installed that instantly repairs damaged parts or creates materials necessary for human survival, increasing independence. The Nexus has space fighters and bombers, so you can deploy them instantly when you need to defend or attack your enemies. These space combat vehicles work in tandem with the Nexus' railguns and missile batteries to provide heavy fire support to the enemy. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Finally, the Nexus has its own very strong defense system. It effectively deters enemies from attacking the Nexus, while protecting lifeforms and facilities inside the Nexus. As such, the Nexus serves as a powerful base for life and survival in space and an important stepping stone for human colonization of space.
The Nexus is a futuristic support unit that heals friendly units while reducing combat strength and damaging enemy units adjacent to it each turn. Cannot own more than 4 Nexus.
Futuristic support unit that heals friendly units while reducing combat strength and damaging enemy units adjacent to it each turn, and can carry up to 4 Aircraft. Cannot own more than 4 Nexus.
Airborne Forces
Strong infantry Unit capable of paradropping up to 5 tiles from friendly territory. Paratrooper can also move and pillage after paradropping, but cannot enter combat until the following turn.

The Paratrooper is a late-game infantryman. It is about as strong mechanized infantry unit; however, it can parachute up to 5 tiles away (when starting in friendly territory). This allows the airborne forces to literally jump over enemy positions and destroy road networks, pillage vital resources and so forth, wrecking havoc behind his lines. The Airborne Forces are at great risk when on such missions, so make sure the target is worth it!

Airborne forces are military units, usually light infantry, set up to be moved by aircraft and "dropped" into battle, typically by parachute. Thus, they can be placed behind enemy lines, and have the capability to deploy almost anywhere with little warning. The formations are limited only by the number and size of their aircraft, so given enough capacity a huge force can appear "out of nowhere" in minutes, an action referred to as vertical envelopment.
Space Marines
A powerful recon land unit capable of airdropping from friendly territory. After descending, you can move and loot, but you cannot fight until the next turn.

Space Marine is a reconnaissance ground unit that helps capture cities in the later stages. Can orbital drop in friendly territory. This allows a Space Marine to cause mayhem behind his lines, literally outrunning enemy positions, destroying road networks and plundering vital resources.

The Space Marines or Adeptus Astartes are foremost amongst the defenders of Humanity, the greatest of the Emperor of Mankind's warriors. They are barely Human at all, but superhuman; having been made superior in all respects to a normal man by a harsh regime of genetic modification, psycho-conditioning and rigorous training. The armor of a Space Marine is composed of layered ceramite and adamantium, Terminator Armour is threaded through with electromotivated fibre bundles and servo-assisted interfaces that link into the user's own neurological and muscular systems to enhance movement.
Tyrannosaurus Rex

One of the most iconic of the dinosaurs, it was inevitable that efforts would be made to resurrect the Tyrannosaurus Rex. Benefiting from genetic manipulation, the Tyrannosaurus Rex of Jurassic Park is powerful and fast, but its strength has made it difficult to deal with any animals that escape.
An agressive dinosaur unit that escaped from Jurassic Park. No cost and hunt better in open terrains.
An agressive dinosaur unit that escaped from Jurassic Park. No cost and hunt better in open terrains.
Triceratops

An iconic plant-eating dinosaur, the Triceratops is slow-moving, but its hide and bony plates give it immense protection. Some animals have escaped from their captivity, and have required anti-tank weapons to be brought down.
A defensive dinosaur unit that escaped from Jurassic Park. No cost and can overturn heavy vehicles.
A defensive dinosaur unit that escaped from Jurassic Park. No cost and can overturn heavy vehicles.
Velociraptor

One of the most frightening of the genetically re-engineered dinosaurs of Jurassic Park, Velociraptors are quite intelligent and frequently try to find ways to escape captivity. While not as strong as the T-Rex and not as tough as a Triceratops, they are extremely fast and can be difficult to hunt down once they've escaped.
A mobile dinosaur unit that escaped from Jurassic Park. No cost and hunt better in vegetations.
A mobile dinosaur unit that escaped from Jurassic Park. No cost and hunt better in vegetations.
Advanced Mobile SAM

Advanced Mobile SAM (surface-to-air) units provide an army with anti-air defense. Advanced Mobile SAM units can intercept and shoot at enemy aircraft bombing targets within 4 hexes (but only one unit per turn). These units are fairly vulnerable to non-air attack and should be accompanied by infantry or armor.
Will intercept enemy aircraft which try to bomb nearby Units. Two missiles can be mounted.

As helicopters developed into more efficient killing machines, the infantry in turn developed weapons designed to combat the growing menace - not to mention the danger posed by jet fighters. Modern "SAMs" (surface-to-air missiles) are fast, light, and contain radar, allowing them to "lock on" to enemy aircraft and fly into them, exploding violently and doing all sorts of probably lethal damage to the fragile planes and choppers. In response more stealthy vehicles have been created and also better missile-jamming technology has been employed. Still, SAM launchers make it hot indeed for enemy aircraft, providing good protection to fellow ground-pounders from the airborne menace.
Javelin
Information late-era Ranged unit specialized against Armor Units.
The Javelin has better range and deals mored damage than it's predecessor, the Bazooka. It is designed for hitting and destroying heavily armored military vehicles.

The Javelin (Advanced Anti-Tank Weapon System-Medium) is a ranged unit that can do massive damage, especially against armored units. It is the most powerful ranged unit, boasting a long range of 3, but slow movement and weak when defending. Therefore, it must be used to consume enemy units. It has better range and more damage than the traditional bazooka. Like a machine gun, it weakens nearby enemy units. When attacking, mobile anti-tank missiles deal reduced damage to fortified units and cities, but more damage to armored units. This makes a great defensive unit.
ATGM Vehicle
Information late-era Ranged unit specialized against Armor Units.
The ATGM vehicle has more mobility and deals mored damage than it's predecessor, the Javelin. It is designed for hitting and destroying heavily armored military vehicles.

The ATGM vehicle (Anti-Tank Guided Missile Vehicle) is a ranged unit that can do massive damage, especially against armored units. It is the most powerful ranged unit, boasting a long range of 3, but weak when defending. Therefore, it must be used to consume enemy units. It has better range, mobility and damage than the traditional bazooka. Like a machine gun, it weakens nearby enemy units. When attacking, mobile anti-tank missiles deal reduced damage to fortified units and cities, but more damage to armored units. This makes a great defensive unit.

A powered exoskeleton (also known as power armor, powered armor, powered suit, cybernetic suit, cybernetic armor, exosuit, hardsuit, exoframe or augmented mobility) is a wearable mobile machine that is powered by a system of electric motors, pneumatics, levers, hydraulics, or a combination of technologies that allow for limb movement with increased strength and endurance. Its design aims to provide back support, sense the user's motion, and send a signal to motors which manage the gears. The exoskeleton supports the shoulder, waist and thigh, and assists movement for lifting and holding heavy items, while lowering back stress. The earliest-known exoskeleton-like device was an apparatus for assisting movement developed in 1890 by Russian engineer Nicholas Yagin. It used energy stored in compressed gas bags to assist in movement, although it was passive and required human power. While Power Armors were only a domain of science fiction, today they are simple and 'cheap' to build and are already employed in the Medical, Civilian, Industrial and of course Military fields.
Power Armor Infantry

Power Armor Infantry are stronger and faster to build than regular Infantry. Although fast, they cannot move after combat like Tanks; their primary responsibility is, as always, to take and hold the ground.
Fast, basic Unit of the future that requires no special resources to build.
Elite Mercenaries
Enhanced Mercenaries
BioMercenaries
Intercontinental Ballistic Missile

An Intercontinental Ballistic Missile (ICBM) is a ballistic missile with a range of more than 5,500 kilometres (3,400 mi). typically designed for nuclear weapons delivery (delivering one or more nuclear warheads). Most modern designs support multiple independently targetable reentry vehicles (MIRVs), allowing a single missile to carry several warheads, each of which can strike a different target.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Early ICBMs had limited accuracy and that allowed them to be used only against the largest targets such as cities. They were seen as a "safe" basing option, one that would keep the deterrent force close to home where it would be difficult to attack. Attacks against military targets, if desired, still demanded the use of a manned bomber. Second and third generation designs dramatically improved accuracy to the point where even the smallest point targets can be successfully attacked. Similar evolution in size has allowed similar missiles to be placed on submarines, where they are known as submarine-launched ballistic missiles, or SLBMs. Submarines are an even safer basing option than land-based missiles, able to move about the ocean at will. This evolution in capability has pushed the manned bomber from the front-line deterrent forces, and land-based ICBMs have similarly given way largely to SLBMs.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]ICBMs are differentiated by having greater range and speed than other ballistic missiles: intermediate-range ballistic missiles (IRBMs), medium-range ballistic missiles (MRBMs), short-range ballistic missiles (SRBMs)—these shorter range ballistic missiles are known collectively as theatre ballistic missiles. There is no single, standardized definition of what ranges would be categorized as intercontinental, intermediate, medium, or short.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The launch of a non-nuclear ICBM would be considered so threatening that it would demand a nuclear response, eliminating any military value of such a weapon. The greatest known range of an ICBM is 16,000 km (RSM-56 Bulava).
When you want to have the power to touch any part of the world, this is the tool that you should use.
The ICBM is an advanced guided missile with a staggering range and no maintenance cost. Requires 1 [ICON_RES_OIL] to build.
Ballistic Missile Submarine

Tougher and stronger than the normal Nuclear Submarine. It too is invisible to most units and can see other submarines, but becomes visible when it attacks or is adjacent to another unit. Most importantly, the Ballistic Missile Sub can carry guided missiles and nuclear missiles (up to 8). This vessel excels at carrying large numbers of missiles to rain death down on your enemies.
The Ballistic Missile Submarine is invisible to all Units except Destroyers and other Submarines. Can carry 2 Missiles. Extremely strong against Naval Units. Requires [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium.

The Ballistic Missile Submarine is an upgrade to the Nuclear Submarine and is available on the discovery of Advanced Ballistics. It does not become obsolete. Requires [ICON_RES_URANIUM] Uranium. The Surface Warship Dockyard is required to build this unit. Limit of 4 per civilization.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A Ballistic Missile Submarine is a submarine capable of deploying submarine-launched ballistic missiles (SLBMs) with nuclear warheads. The United States Navy's hull classification symbols for ballistic missile submarines are SSB and SSBN – the SS denotes submarine (or submersible ship), the B denotes ballistic missile, and the N denotes that the submarine is nuclear powered.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]These submarines became a major weapon system in the Cold War because of their nuclear deterrence capability. They can fire missiles thousands of kilometers from their targets, and acoustic quieting makes them difficult to detect, thus making them a survivable deterrent in the event of a first strike and a key element of the mutual assured destruction policy of nuclear deterrence. Their deployment has been dominated by the United States and the Soviet Union / Russia, with smaller numbers in service with France, the United Kingdom, China, and India.
Megahive

The Megahive is capable of insterstellar travel is perhaps the ultimate expression of AI-Technology. Its ability to hover over any terrain gives it unparalleled mobility, and it has incredible combat ability from its own ranged attack. It cannot take cities on its own, however, and thus requires at least some ground units to assist it.
The Megahive is a Spaceship Unit that can traverse any terrain. Has a combat bonus against cities, but cannot capture them.
Unique Spaceship hovering unit that can cross any terrain. Has a combat bonus against cities, but cannot capture them.
Advanced Helicopter
Unit specialized in fighting Armor tanks and hovering over mountains.

The Advanced Helicopter is a deadly air unit that in most respects acts like any ground unit, except that it cannot capture cities. Its movement of 7 makes it extremely quick, and it can move over all terrain types including mountains as if they were clear, but it must embark to cross water. Modern Helicopters receive a hefty combat bonus when fighting tanks. It's strength of 85 and its ability to outflank opponents allows it to triumph over Giant Death Robots.

The Boeing AH-64 Apache is a four-blade, twin-engine attack helicopter with a tailwheel-type landing gear arrangement, and a tandem cockpit for a two-man crew. It features a nose-mounted sensor suite for target acquisition and night vision systems. It is armed with a 30 mm (1.18 in) M230 Chain Gun carried between the main landing gear, under the aircraft's forward fuselage. It has four hardpoints mounted on stub-wing pylons, typically carrying a mixture of AGM-114 Hellfire missiles and Hydra 70 rocket pods. The AH-64 has a large amount of systems redundancy to improve combat survivability.
Bio Cruiser
The last powerful ranged naval unit of the future era. Recovers HP each turn and can move. Contains 4 missiles.

In a new era of advanced biotechnology and genetic research, the Navy's cruisers have undergone revolutionary changes. Using breakthroughs in gene acceleration and the knowledge gained from extensive studies of the ocean and marine life, the Navy has driven changes to the hulls of its ships. This change is vastly different from the methods used before, and ships now have the ability to move and recover very quickly. The key to this change is the aircraft's automatic recovery system. This system adopts the biological recovery system's algorithm, allowing damaged hulls to be quickly repaired. This technology is the result of research on hybrid drones, which can maximize the aircraft's recovery ability and ensure a much longer ship lifespan. While the ship's basic structure still follows the traditional methods used, these innovative technologies allow ships to be operated in a more effective way. They can still be equipped with radar and guns and can move anywhere on the sea, but now they have the opportunity to mount much larger weapons and thicker armor. Thanks to cutting-edge research on marine life, it is now possible to develop ships with the ability to be protected from predators, work effectively in the depths, or even survive in hostile environments. This innovation has given humanity a new way to reimagine life at sea.
Dominate the seas and show your enemies the might of your civilization. Let's show the enemy the power of the sea with excellent survival!
Bio Destroyer
The last powerful melee naval unit of the future era. Recovers HP each turn, and you can see the submarine from a distance. It is possible to move. Contains 4 missiles.

In a new era of advanced biotechnology and genetic research, the Navy's destroyers have undergone unprecedented changes. Leveraging breakthroughs in gene acceleration and knowledge gained from comprehensive studies of the ocean and marine life, the Navy pushed for changes to the destroyer's hull. As a result of this change, destroyers now have the ability to move and recover faster. Advanced research into marine life has revolutionized hull design and defense systems. Now you can develop destroyers with the capabilities you need to detect submarines hiding in the deepest reaches of the ocean, show off your power at sea, or even attack cities. This innovation gave humanity a new way to gain a tactical advantage at sea.
A very powerful and expensive naval melee unit, capable of tracking submarines from a distance and effectively dealing with all air threats.
Railgun Destroyer
A powerful melee naval unit from the future. Submarines can be seen from afar. Contains 4 missiles.

The Railgun Destroyer is a state-of-the-art naval ship equipped with modern cutting-edge technology. This destroyer is equipped with a railgun, a fast-firing weapon that uses electromagnetic waves as its main weapon, replacing traditional projectile weapons. The railgun is a weapon that fires projectiles at super high speed to destroy targets. It boasts tremendous destructive power with speed close to the speed of light and tremendous energy. Destroyers were originally intended to detect and eliminate subsurface threats, particularly submarines. However, the railgun destroyer has gone beyond these functions and has more powerful offensive and defensive capabilities. Because the railgun has no atmospheric resistance, its trajectory is remarkably accurate, and it reaches the target very quickly, greatly reducing the enemy's reaction time. These capabilities are critical in modern naval combat armed with a variety of weapons and sensors.
A very powerful and expensive naval melee unit, capable of tracking submarines from a distance and effectively dealing with all air threats.
Railgun Cruiser
A powerful long-range naval unit from the future. Contains 4 missiles.

The Railgun Cruiser is the Navy's flagship combat vessel equipped with a larger platform Railgun weapon system. These cruisers are equipped with larger and more powerful railguns than railgun destroyers, allowing them to attack farther, more accurately, and more destructively. The cruiser's role is to balance offensive and defensive power, and perform various missions. While a railgun cruiser meets these requirements, she has relatively strong firepower due to her amazing railgun weaponry. The high speed and high energy characteristics of her railguns make this cruiser effective at gaining superiority at sea, besieging or attacking cities. She utilizes the cutting edge of electromagnetic wave science and engineering to enhance her performance. They are a prime example of the power of modern naval forces, and their mighty railguns are formidable at sea.
Dominate the seas and show your enemies the might of your civilization. Let's show the enemy the power of the sea with excellent survival!
Plasma Bomber

It has formidable attack power against ground targets. The Plasma Bomber developed a plasma missile using superconductor technology with an engine that harnesses plasma energy. These missiles use high-energy plasma to unleash tremendous destructive power, allowing bombers to accurately strike targets from safe altitudes. Additionally, the stealth feature allows the bomber to approach its target while evading enemy defenses. These features make it the bomber with the best precision strike capability.
Plasma Bomber with high-powered plasma engines that can only be transported by Nexus and Helicarrier. Attack cities and units while avoiding enemy air defenses.
Plasma Bomber with high-powered plasma engines that can only be transported by Nexus and Helicarrier. Nanomaterials are needed.
Plasma Fighter

Combining advanced stealth technology with powerful plasma engine propulsion using superconductors, it is a fighter that plays a key role in the modern combat space. The unique plasma engine uses ionized particles in the atmosphere to generate tremendous thrust, allowing the plasma fighter to move quickly and flexibly while consuming relatively little energy. Additionally, these engines allow fighters to fly at high altitudes while avoiding enemy detection. This fighter's weapon is equipped with a superconductor-powered railgun, which fires large amounts of plasma at high speed to deliver powerful attacks in and out of the atmosphere.

Plasma Fighter is a fighter with a high-powered plasma engine that can only be moved by Nexus and Helicarrier. Attack cities and units while avoiding enemy air defenses, and defend cities and Helicarriers from enemy airstrikes.
Plasma Fighter is a fighter with a high-powered plasma engine that can only be moved by Nexus and Helicarrier. Nanomaterials are needed.
Helicarrier

The Helicarrier is an air unit created through a combination of advanced technology and new technology. It is an innovative combat and support platform that replaces the capabilities of an aircraft carrier and provides flexibility and maneuverability far beyond that. During the development of advanced spaceship engines, the technology to continuously levitate was obtained. This helicarrier, which is not very fast but can move compliantly, compensates for the shortcomings of any existing air unit and enables flexible operation. . It is designed to operate in almost all types of weather conditions and environments, and can provide air support in any area. The Helicarrier is equipped with a variety of equipment and systems required to perform a variety of combat and support missions. You can operate a variety of air units, including high-speed fighters, combat helicopters, and drones, and counter airborne threats with powerful weaponry, including high-intensity lasers and missile systems. In addition, the Helicarrier enables information collection and analysis on the battlefield and rapid command delivery through complex sensors and communication equipment. This allows the Helicarrier to perform surveillance, communications, command, control, and intelligence functions in the air, all of which are crucial to tactical superiority. Overall, the Helicarrier sets new standards in combat support through its innovative design and functionality, constantly pushing the boundaries.
The Helicarrier is a futuristic support unit capable of hovering on the ground. You cannot have more than 4 Helicarriers in your civilization.
As an auxiliary unit of the future era, it can hover on the ground and can load 6 basic aircraft. Limited to 4 per civilization.
Advanced Mechanized Infantry
Incredibly fast and powerful, this late-game Unit require Aluminum to be built.

Advanced Mechanized Infantry are stronger and faster than Mechanized Infantry. In addition to fast, Advanced Mech Infantry move after combat like Modern Armor and can heal even we in make an action; A mix between the Infantry and the armored vehicles.

Unit powered with exoskeleton, also known as powered armor, or exoframe, is a powered mobile machine consisting primarily of an exoskeleton-like framework worn by a person and a power supply that supplies at least part of the activation-energy for limb movement. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]These depictions can be described as a battlesuit with mechanical and electronic mechanisms designed to augment the wearer's abilities. Other power armors are portrayed as being much larger, more like a bipedal vehicle the size of a tank or much larger. The line between mecha and power armor is necessarily vague.
Distributed Computing
Distributed Computing

The advancement of computing systems has increasingly resulted in their distribution across a wider network of computers. Parallel processing allows computations to be conducted more quickly, as various calaculations can be carried out simultaneously, while distributed computer networks create systems that are more flexible and resilient against mechanical failure, as they are no longer limited to single machines.

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Vertols[ENDCOLOR], a hovering military unit, and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Arsenal Ships[ENDCOLOR], a futuristic ranged naval unit, as well as [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Research Servers[ENDCOLOR] which increase [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Autoplants[ENDCOLOR] which increase [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"All of a sudden, we've lost a lot of control. We can't turn off our internet; we can't turn off our smartphones; we can't turn off our computers." -- Steve Wozniak[NEWLINE][TAB]
Environmentalism
Environmentalism

The increasing awareness of ecological systems and how they work has, in turn, lead to concerns about the impact of human activity upon them. Environmentalism is a broad social movement that emphasizes environmental protection and the health of the environment. It advocates for the lawful preservation, restoration, and improvement of the natural environment, and typically seeks to control pollution and encourage natural diversity.

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Geothermal Plants[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tidal Plants[ENDCOLOR], which increase [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production. Also allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Nature Preserves[ENDCOLOR], which provide [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"We have lived our lives by the assumption that what was good for us would be good for the world. We have been wrong. We must change our lives so that it will be possible to live by the contrary assumption, that what is good for the world will be good for us. And that requires that we make the effort to know the world and learn what is good for it." -- Wendell Berry[NEWLINE][TAB]
Augmented Reality
Augmented Reality
Superconductivity - Plasma Energy Dynamics
Superconductivity - Plasma Energy Dynamics

Superconducting-Plasma Energy Mechanics is an innovative field of study created through the combination of superconducting and plasma technologies. Research in this field has developed a technology that generates a strong magnetic field and uses it to control plasma. This field of study has revolutionized the way we produce energy. The use of superconducting-plasma energy dynamics allows stable control of fusion reactions, which can be a powerful means of providing safe and efficient energy. This made it possible to control the plasma and maintain a high energy state, enabling efficient generation of fusion energy. Additionally, this technology has been used in the research and development of high-speed electromagnetic flight vehicles. This enables a high degree of energy efficiency and high power output, which has been used to make spacecraft faster than ever before. Finally, the technology of superconducting-plasma energy mechanics also had an impact on weapon systems. Plasma-powered weapons have great destructive power, which has brought about a great change in military strategy. Superconducting-plasma energy dynamics is expected to play a pivotal role in future technological development, which is expected to greatly change our lives in many ways.

You can build high-speed railways in your city, with walking self-propelled artillery and magnetic levitation trains available to help you attack the city. Plasma bombers and fighters can be mass produced. In addition, the quantum mechanical part has been improved, so it can be developed into various modules within the space station.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Physics is the only profession in which prophecy is not only accurate but routine."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Neil deGrasse Tyson[NEWLINE][TAB]
Orbital Development

While national governments still have the most resources to invest in space exploration, commercial enterprises have become increasingly interested in the opportunities of privatized access to space. Either way, orbital development holds opportunities for both research and industrial production, as well as helping facilitate and maintain increasingly complex orbital communication networks.

You can develop space by building a spaceship factory and a spaceship launch facility. Through related research, it is possible to produce defensive ground units called battle suits. In order to adapt to the external environment, technology for alternative meat factories has also developed.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The exploration and use of outer space,including the moon and other celestial bodies, shall be carried out for the benefit and in the interests of all countries, irrespective of their degree of economic or scientific development, and shall be the province of all mankind."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Article 1 of the Treaty on Principles Governing the Activities of States in the Exploration and Use of Outer Space, Including the Moon and Other Celestial Bodies[NEWLINE][TAB]
Euthenics

The science concerned with establishing the optimum living conditions for humans, animals and plants, especially through proper provisioning and environment. If Facism is your ideology, Eugenics will improve the genetic quality of a human population, enhancing individual traits, in favor of certain group membership.

You can build clonetroopers and eco-friendly villages using AND fungus. You can construct a fungal agronomic laboratory that can utilize ADN fungus and a building that increases the production of the ocean.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"People used to say to my friend Mary, a quadriplegic, 'You still have your mind.' She would say, 'I still have my body.' The world tells me to divorce myself from my flesh, to live in my head... I don't want to be fleshless."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Anne Finger[NEWLINE][TAB]
Organics

As the methods of genetic manipulation become increasingly refined, the possibiilty of using genetics to produce more effective organs and organic components increases. While the wholescale manipulation of the human genome would produce more effective results, the sheer complexity of the task makes it easier to focus on engineering organic components to specific standards, even if the rest of the host body suffers significant problems. While there are some concerns about the ethics of using these engineered host bodies to incubate augmented organs, they do prove to be increasingly valuable and useful, whether in enhancing the productivity and effectiveness of workers, or in making more powerful soldiers for the battlefield.
You can build reinforced body infantry and hybird drones.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Life is an inherently depreciating asset."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Suzanne Marjorie Fielding, Transplanetary Management, Methods, and Resources[NEWLINE][TAB]
Mechatronics

Mechatronics, developed in the early stages of the 21st Century, is an interdisciplinary, synergistic melding of electrical and computer engineering, telecommunications and control systems in mechanical design. It allows for advanced automation in “dumb” machines. Programmed in repetitive patterns free of expensive oversight, mechatronics allows for inexpensive, efficient automated production facilities of basic consumer items. Things like furnishings, clothing, hand tools … indeed, anything without elaborate moving parts … can be produced in large quantities with minimal human involvement. An offshoot of mechatronics is the field of bio-mechatronics, which seeks to integrate mechanical parts with a human body, usually in the form of removable items such as powered myoelectric prostheses or exoskeletons.
Mechatronics allows for the development of remotely operated machinery and robotics, including the mobile and ballistic LEV units.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Machines can be journeymen to machine apprentices, as long as we are still the masters."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Hutama, We are All Destined to Prosper[NEWLINE][TAB]
ECO-Power Systems

From the crude coal-fired electrical generators to the massive “sunscoop,” the production of Energy on Old Earth was a race against demand and dwindling resources. On this planet, plentiful sources, traditional or unexpected, for the production of Energy to feed the needs of the growing colonies exist. It was only a matter of those first colonial engineers discovering how to extract and utilize those sources, constructing innovative power plants and transmission systems; utilizing a variety of methods, colonial survival is a testament to their success in doing so. Even today research into sustainable power systems is critical if we are to avoid the Energy crises that plagued distant Earth.
Oil can be extracted from wheat resources. Build generators to strengthen towns, industrial parks and advanced energy research parks.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The necessity of an artificial power source is a myth. An ecosystem powers itself. When humanity learns to live in harmony with its surroundings, we will reap the same benefits of power."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Daoming Sochua, Scientific Morality Vol.VII[NEWLINE][TAB]
Astrodynamics

The application of celestial mechanics to practical matters concerning orbital flight development and interstellar mapping lately has become one of the most vital topics of research for space exploration. As the colonists contemplated a return to space, astrodynamics – founded on the ancient laws of Newton and Kepler – laid out the unvarying formulae of free, circular, elliptical, parabolic and hyperbolic orbits. But advances in design and energy sources, coupled with the differences in mass and rotational period of this planet compared to Old Earth, meant that velocities and orbital periods could be increased and shortened respectively. Soon enough, satellites of every sort circled overhead. This in turn triggered a new interest in the “geography” of near space among the Earth; the result was a plentitude of new planetariums and research grants devoted to the heavens as many felt manned space missions would occur within their lifetime.
Astrodynamics allows space navigation, “Space Surveillance Network”

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"I never cease to find beauty in the fact that even though we walk among the stars, we still hold them in awe."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Samatar Jama Barre, This is Not Exile[NEWLINE][TAB]
Implants
Implants

Implants are man-made devices that are implanted or grafted to living tissue. They came in a wide range of types and effects, and would most likely work like mutations, but are artifacts that must be surgically implanted to the host's body. While there are some concerns about the ethics of using these implants, they do prove to be increasingly valuable and useful, whether in enhancing the productivity and effectiveness of workers, or in making more powerful soldiers for the battlefield.

Prosthetic transplants allow fast walking, bio-enhanced infantry with excellent body regeneration, and mutant diplomats invisible to external enemies. You can also build implant parlors to strengthen your ground units. Installing an Apex Center will enhance your spy's abilities and give you a great diplomat.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"And he causeth all, both small and great, rich and poor, free and bond, to receive a mark in their right hand, or in their foreheads: And that no man might buy or sell, save he that had the mark, or the name of the beast, or the number of his name."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Revelations, the Bible[NEWLINE][TAB]
Neural Interface
Neural Interface

As machines have become increasingly sophisticated, the interfaces required to interact with them have as well. Being able to control a machine with one's thoughts as an extension of one's body would be an incredible achievement, making it far simpler to perform complex tasks with mechanical assistance. However, the brain is itself a highly complex organ, and achieving a direct interface a significant challenge. Still, progress is being made in establishing connections between computers and other technological devices and human nerves, allowing both motor control and sensory input of technological devices.
Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cybersubs[ENDCOLOR], the most advanced submarine unit.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"A picture is worth a thousand words. An interface is worth a thousand pictures."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Ben Shneiderman[NEWLINE][TAB]
Cognitive Technology
Cognitive Technology

As the capability to produce increasingly small-scale devices develops, so has the capacity to integrate computer systems into practically any item or material, and with the development of networked computing, allows appliances or other objects to be made increasingly "smart". A smart home, for example, can monitor activity in various rooms, adjusting lighting or temperature as needed to conserve power. Smart appliances can monitor usage and even determine when to place orders for new food or other supplies as needed. Furthermore, even simple "smart" systems acting in concert can display increasingly intelligent emergent behavior.

Combining automation systems and cognitive engineering can produce offensive robots and arsenal ships. Network hubs can be installed to strengthen sub-connections between cities. Virtua Idol World Wonders can be built.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Digital behavior is just a replication of human behavior."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Paul Papadimitriou[NEWLINE][TAB]
Rare Resource Exploration

The development of nanomaterials derived from rare resource exploration has shown that it is possible to manipulate materials at the molecular and atomic level to create new materials and structures. The next challenge in finding true nanotechnology is to produce real working components (power sources, motors and other mechanical parts) at this scale so that nanoscale machines can do the work. Increasingly sophisticated tools are devised to manipulate molecules at the nanoscale, making sophisticated and futuristic materials much more common and usable.

It will enable deep-sea mining and exploration of the Earth, enabling production in many cities and nanomaterials in the ocean. Hills and mountains can also be explored for minerals, increasing the city's output.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Infinities and indivisibles transcend our finite understanding, the former on account of their magnitude, the latter because of their smallness; Imagine what they are when combined."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Galileo Galilei[NEWLINE][TAB]
Designer Lifeforms
Designer Lifeforms

While the genetic modification of the human genome holds the most promise for human augmentation, it is a highly complex endeavor as the human genome is the product of millions of years of evolution. A simpler undertaking is to take much simpler genomes, such as those found in plants and animals, in order to modify them more drastically -- or even produce entirely new genomes. In time, experimentation with genetic manipulation lead to the capability to craft and engineer entirely new organisms, leading to the term "gengineering", a portmanetau of the term "genetic engineering". With the capbility to engineer living organisms to fill specific ecological niches and other roles, it becomes increasingly possible to manipulate the environment to meet particular needs or desires.

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Chimeras[ENDCOLOR], genetically engineered combat units, as well as [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Biogenesis pods[ENDCOLOR] which increase the production of Mutants and Chimeras, and provide newly created units with unique promotions.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"If you realize that all things change, there is nothing you will try to hold on to. If you are not afraid of dying, there is nothing you cannot achieve."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Lao Tzu, Tao Te Ching[NEWLINE][TAB]
Biomodification

While the term "gengineering" refers to the creation of entirely new organisms through genetic manipulation, biomodification reflects taking existing organisms and modifying them to improve their capabilities in various ways. In particular, modification of the human genome allows the adaptation of individuals to augmented forms that can meet a variety of needs, whether it be strength and durability in combat, or the ability to work in hazardous environments. As biomodfication becomes increasingly prevalent, more environments become available to humans to live and work, although the definition of what constitutes being "human" starts to become blurred.

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Biotroopers[ENDCOLOR], the most powerful genetically-engineered infantry, as well as [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Bioenhancement Centres[ENDCOLOR] which increase the production of Mutants and Chimeras, and provide newly created units with unique promotions, as well as [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Genejack Facilities[ENDCOLOR], which increase [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"As human beings, our only sensible scale of values is one based on lessening the agony of existence."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - H.P. Lovecraft[NEWLINE][TAB]
Artificial Environments

Manned exploration and inhabitation of outer space will require significant advances in the technologies available to sustain humans in one of the most hostile environment possible. In particular, self-sustaining environments that can provide breathable atmosphere, drinkable water, and food will be needed. These technologies will not be applicable only to space travel, however, as it will enable us to create self-contained environments underground, in arid regions, or under the ocean, greatly increasing the volume of space available for human habitation.

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Vertical Farms[ENDCOLOR] and [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Hydroponics Domes[ENDCOLOR] in order to increase [ICON_FOOD] Food output, as well as [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Geofronts[ENDCOLOR] to improve city defense.
[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The more artificial a human environment becomes, the more the word 'natural' becomes a term of value."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Wendell Berry[NEWLINE][TAB]
Orbital Space Production

Orbital production is a concept that encompasses the cultivation, purification, manufacture, and production of various biological and non-biological raw materials in Earth orbit. It crosses the boundaries of scientific research and the commercial space industry, and presents a wide range of application possibilities for production systems in space environments.
Later in the game, you can build X-COM, a powerful recon unit. It can also create orbital refineries and orbital food-growing facilities that provide production and nanomaterials.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"The tricky thing about adamantium is, that if you ever manage to process its raw, liquid form, you got to keep it that way, keep it hot. Because once the metal cools, it's indestructible."[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - X-Men[NEWLINE][TAB]
Arcologies

The term 'arcology' is a portmaneteau of the words 'architecture' and 'ecology', and is a vision of architectural design principles for very densely populated habitats. An arcology is distinguished from a merely large building in that it is designed to lessen the impact of human habitation on any given ecosystem. Adapting to life within an arcology would likely require social and cultural adaptation as well, with an increased emphasis on frugality and shared social resources, and a lessening of private space.

Allows you to build [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Aerospace Complexes[ENDCOLOR], which increase the air capacity of a City, [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Orbital Habitats[ENDCOLOR], which increase [ICON_FOOD] Food, and the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Central Command[ENDCOLOR], which improves Information Hubs, Distribution Hubs, and Metroplex Hubs across the empire. Also allows Workers to construct [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Arcologies[ENDCOLOR], which provide [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_GOLD] Gold.

[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Architecture is the physical form of the ecology of the human, the configuration of matter which allows for the best energetic and willful flux"[NEWLINE][TAB][TAB] - Paolo Soleri[NEWLINE][TAB]
